definition: see 天涯海角[tian1 ya2 hai3 jiao3]
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
surname Hai
surname Jue
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
day/sky/heaven
border/horizon/shore

sentences.english: Longitudinal trail far-off regions ethereal, go native heart mirror.
sentences.chinese: 海角天涯纵踪迹缥缈，魂归故土心可鉴。

sentences.english: Give me a little courage, let me accompany you along with your far-off regions.
sentences.chinese: 给我一点勇气，让我伴你闯荡，跟你海角天涯。

sentences.english: Waiting for you to come, cape tianya, mountain flower romance with me.
sentences.chinese: 等你来，海角天涯，和我一起山花浪漫。

sentences.english: Automatic spontaneous child to go over the ends of the earth to be popular everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 自动自发的孩子就是走遍海角天涯都处处受欢迎。

sentences.english: To find, even the best of all, the cape.
sentences.chinese: 去找，哪怕倾尽所有，海角天涯。

sentences.english: How those silent promise also scattered at the cape there?
sentences.chinese: 怎么那些缄默的诺言也散在海角天涯了吗。

definition: Cape Haijiao in Sanya 三亞|三亚[San1 ya4], Hainan
the ends of the earth/separated worlds apart
ten thousand crags and torrents (idiom); the trials and tribulations of a long journey/a long and difficult road

long and arduous journey (idiom)
so close, yet worlds apart (idiom)
from dawn to dusk/all the time

lit. when the seas run dry and the stones go soft (idiom)/fig. forever/until the end of time
(of relatives or friends) to live far apart from each other

far away/thousands of miles/10000 li
Wan Li (1916-2015), PRC politician
high as the mountain and long as the river (idiom); fig. noble and far-reaching
a thousand miles/a thousand li (i.e. 500 kilometers)/a long distance
to roam far and wide (idiom)/to travel the world
foreign land/a place far from home
